medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient woke up on the morning of presentation with 'indigestion' and developed severe band-like abdominal pain in the epigastric region that radiated to both sides and into her back, worse on the left. The pain was accompanied by several episodes of nausea and vomiting. Pain improved after administration of morphine.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Anxiety, agoraphobia, osteoporosis, breast cancer (s/p lumpectomy and radiation), left lumpectomy, removal of back cyst.
